name: Lottery 2
objective:
The number on the %%icon icon-egg$%% egg to the right of the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron indicates the number of the column of the egg to put into the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron.
The number on the %%icon icon-egg$%% egg below the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron indicates the number of the row.

%%icon mdi mdi-alert-octagon-outline$%%Do not take the other %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs.

%%icon mdi mdi-alert-octagon-outline$%%Maximum number of heroes: 50
loss_reason_took_wrong_egg: One of the heroes took the wrong egg
loss_reason_too_mush_heroes:
The maximum number of heroes has been exceeded.
